akas: Praktoras... sto tsak Greece (transliterated ISO-LATIN-1 title)
akas from release info: Praktoras... sto tsak Greece (transliterated ISO-LATIN-1 title)

1.title: Chuck Versus the Zoom
1.plot: Now the head of his own spy agency, Chuck takes on a slick thief and an investor who has stolen money from dangerous criminals. Morgan aids Chuck in planning a surprise for Sarah. Jeff and Lester launch their latest scheme at the Buy More.

2.title: Chuck Versus the Bearded Bandit
2.plot: As Carmichael Industries takes on a missing persons case, Chuck must acclimatize himself to being Morgan's handler and deal with a rival agency. The Buy More gets a new spokesperson.

3.title: Chuck Versus the Frosted Tips
3.plot: Chuck worries Morgan is letting the Intersect change his attitude for the worse. Sarah gives Casey relationship advice on Gertrude Verbanski. Captain Awesome discovers shocking news about Jeff and Lester.

4.title: Chuck Versus the Business Trip
4.plot: Chuck and Sarah must stop an assassin after the Intersect at a Buy More convention. Jeff shows a new side to himself.

5.title: Chuck Versus the Hack Off
5.plot: Chuck and Sarah infiltrate an unusual cult to find the designer of a computer virus. The Buy More gets a new employee.

6.title: Chuck Versus the Curse
6.plot: A ruthless agent leads a team of rogue CIA spies intent on framing Chuck for a crime he didn't commit.

7.title: Chuck Versus the Santa Suit
7.plot: Chuck and Sarah discover who is behind a plot to take down their company. A computer virus creates havoc as the Buy More prepares for Christmas. Ellie tries to make Christmas plans for everybody.

8.title: Chuck Versus the Baby
8.plot: When Sarah's old spy handler reappears, she goes off on her own to prevent a secret from her past from destroying her family.

9.title: Chuck Versus the Kept Man
9.plot: Gertrude Verbanski returns and asks Casey to join her on a mission in South Beach. Jeff and Lester suspect there's more to the Buy More than meets the Eye

10.title: Chuck Versus Bo
10.plot: Morgan's time with the Intersect compels Chuck and Sarah to take on a mission in Vail and enlist the help of a famous actress. Jeff and Lester continue their own spy mission.

11.title: Chuck Versus the Bullet Train
11.plot: A confrontation with a ruthless agent aboard a Japanese bullet train becomes a hostage situation for Chuck and Sarah and puts Casey in a dire predicament.

12.title: Chuck Versus Sarah
12.plot: Sarah keeps an important secret from Chuck in order to ensure the success of a mission. Ellie and Awesome receive some life-changing news.

13.title: Chuck Versus the Goodbye
13.plot: Chuck enlists the help of his family, friends, and even the employees of the Buy More to stop Nicholas Quinn from destroying everything they have.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Chuck is a computer geek who gets a computer full of information zapped into his brain...information that contains secrets that the federal government desperately needs to keep in Chuck's head...and keep Chuck, himself, intact. In the opener Chuck meets a woman who agrees to go on a date with him, but she's one of the government agents who's interested more in his head than his body.

2.title: Chuck Versus the Helicopter
2.plot: The Government wants to verify the secrets are inside Chuck's head. So they send a doctor who programmed the Intersect system to examine Chuck. When the doctor's car explodes, there's evidence one of the agencies was involved, leaving Chuck unsure whom to trust.

3.title: Chuck Versus the Tango
3.plot: A stolen piece of art is the key for locating a weapon's dealer. Chuck's up for a promotion to assistant manager at work.

4.title: Chuck Versus the Wookiee
4.plot: A rival agent shows up, she needs assistance stealing a gem from a drug lord. Chuck's agents are reluctant to help due to past dealings.

5.title: Chuck Versus the Sizzling Shrimp
5.plot: Chuck spots a Chinese spy in a restaurant. The agents want to find out why she's here in the US. Chuck goes on his first stake out, which is also a special occasion for his family.

6.title: Chuck Versus the Sandworm
6.plot: Chuck spots a man wanted by the government. He finds out the man worked for the government, and just desired a new life. Soon he has Chuck doubting his handlers. Chuck has to interview for Assistant Manager.

7.title: Chuck Versus the Alma Mater
7.plot: When Chuck's former Stanford teacher, who kicked him out of school, is kidnapped, Chuck must face his past by returning to Standford, and recover a disc with information about his past.

8.title: Chuck Versus the Truth
8.plot: Chuck meets a pretty girl with an unusual name, which causes an internal conflict. At the same time, his sister falls prey to someone the government seeks to apprehend.

9.title: Chuck Versus the Imported Hard Salami
9.plot: After breaking up with Sarah, Chuck starts dating Lou. When Chuck flashes on Lou's ex-boyfriend. He's conflicted between his current love interest and his duties. The agents intercept the shipment, and find something totally unexpected.

10.title: Chuck Versus the Nemesis
10.plot: Bryce is alive. When he's revived the only person he wants to talk to is Chuck. He tells Chuck he wasn't rogue, and the people he was working for are after the Intersect. It's up to Team Chuck to bring Bryce in, and protect Bryce and Chuck.

11.title: Chuck Versus the Crown Vic
11.plot: Chuck flashes on a counterfeit bill on a philanthropists yacht. Team Chuck goes undercover to determine what he's up to. Chuck's inexperience causes problems. Morgan meets Anna's parents. Casey receives major news that will affect the entire Team.

12.title: Chuck Versus the Undercover Lover
12.plot: When an old flame from Casey's life shows up, there's big trouble ahead for the whole crew.

13.title: Chuck Versus the Marlin
13.plot: Chuck finds a bug in the Buy More, and gives it to Casey. Neither of his handlers planted that particular bug. Fearing Chuck's cover has been exposed, the government prepares to bring him in. While the agents try to find the culprit, Chuck tries to find an engagement ring Devon asked him to hold until Devon can propose to Ellie.

1.title: Chuck Versus the First Date
1.plot: Team Chuck recovers some equipment. They're told it's the last component for the new Intersect, which will be brought on line. Chuck is relieved at the prospect of returning to a normal life and asks Sarah out. Meanwhile Casey receives orders that cause some inner conflict.

2.title: Chuck Versus the Seduction
2.plot: The team finds out the real part for the Intersect has been stolen. The team tracks down a legendary agent, who has had experience dealing with female spies. Chuck must learn the art of seduction.

3.title: Chuck Versus the Break-Up
3.plot: Fulcrum has intercepted an update for the new Intersect. The chip has data that could expose Team Chuck. Bryce and Sarah must pose as a married couple to get the chip back. Chuck's jealousy causes some problems, but Sarah's decisions endanger the mission, and forces Chuck to make some decisions of his own. Meanwhile the Buy More crew must deal with bullies from a sports store.

4.title: Chuck Versus the Cougars
4.plot: A person from Sarah's past recognizes her, Sarah tries her best to avoid her, but Chuck gets a flash. Now Sarah has no choice but to go to her High School Reunion.

5.title: Chuck Versus Tom Sawyer
5.plot: Chuck flashes on a person at the Buy More, he's a nuclear terrorist looking for Jeff. Chuck hangs out with Jeff to discover why he's being targeted. The team will need Jeff's help prevent a nuclear attack.

6.title: Chuck Versus the Ex
6.plot: Chuck goes to a corporate office and encounters his ex-girlfriend, Jill. He tries to avoid her but they catch up. Later he gets a flash on one of Jill's associates. Now he must reconnect with Jill to determine her involvement. The Buy More crew must pass CPR certification.

7.title: Chuck Versus the Fat Lady
7.plot: General Beckman finds intelligence that suggests Guy had a list of Fulcrum Agents. She orders the team to find the list. This causes some problems when Chuck tries to rekindle his romance with Jill. When Jill is endangered, Chuck is forced to make some difficult decisions, and the team is not prepared for what comes next.

8.title: Chuck Versus the Gravitron
8.plot: Casey and Sarah discover Jill's secret and race to warn Chuck. Now the team tries to lay a trap for Jill, but Jill's not alone. Chuck will find out more about their break up, and he'll have to decide if they should try to rekindle their romance.

9.title: Chuck Versus the Sensei
9.plot: The team encounters a rogue agent, Casey's former Sensei. He's been recruiting former students and getting them to steal weapons and secrets. Ellie must face Awesome's parent who are overly enthusiastically planning the wedding. At the Buy More, everyone competes to be the Employee of the Month.

10.title: Chuck Versus the DeLorean
10.plot: Sarah's father comes for a visit. His latest con involves a sheik with possible terrorist ties. When the sheik shows up, the Team must help her father to pull off the con. Meanwhile Anna makes a suggestion that forces Morgan to consider making more mature decisions, is he ready?

11.title: Chuck Versus Santa Claus
11.plot: A car crashes into the Buy More, everyone inside, including Ellie and Devon are taken hostage. Chuck does his best to protect everyone. The real goals are not evident, and it will lead to some very hard choices.

12.title: Chuck Versus the Third Dimension
12.plot: In a special 3-D episode, Sarah and Casey kidnap an international rock star to see who's behind a plot to murder him. Morgan must pick someone to accompany him backstage to a concert.

13.title: Chuck Versus the Suburbs
13.plot: A new mission has Chuck and Sarah posing as a married couple and interacting with some odd neighbors. The Buy More crew help Big Mike out after his wife files for divorce.

14.title: Chuck Versus the Best Friend
14.plot: While helping a depressed Morgan spy on Anna, Chuck flashes on her boyfriend; Jeff and Lester beg Ellie to hire them to play at her wedding.

15.title: Chuck Versus the Beefcake
15.plot: Chuck gets jealous when Sarah has to get cozy with a suave MI-6 agent to obtain Fulcrum data. Jeff and Lester weasel their way onto the Buy More hiring committee; Morgan starts sleeping at Ellie and Awesome's apartment.

16.title: Chuck Versus the Lethal Weapon
16.plot: Chuck, Sarah, Casey, and an MI-6 agent go after a man who is involved in Fulcrum's development of a new Intersect.

17.title: Chuck Versus the Predator
17.plot: Chuck encounters a scientist that may be able to remove the Intersect from his head, but the cost may be too steep. The Buy More crew take on their snobbish Beverly Hills counterparts.

18.title: Chuck Versus the Broken Heart
18.plot: General Beckman sends a new agent to assess Sarah's relationship with Chuck. Morgan, Jeff, and Lester use any and all means to crash Awesome's bachelor party.

19.title: Chuck Versus the Dream Job
19.plot: Chuck tracks down his long-lost father and gets a job working for one of his idols, not knowing what the job has in store for him.

20.title: Chuck Versus the First Kill
20.plot: To locate his father, Chuck must trust someone who has betrayed him in the past, and the Buy More crew scramble to head off Emmett's evaluations.

21.title: Chuck Versus the Colonel
21.plot: Casey is ordered to pursue Chuck and Sarah, who have gone rogue in order to rescue Chuck's father. Morgan's screw-up makes him Public Enemy #1 among the Buy Morons.

22.title: Chuck Versus the Ring
22.plot: Chuck is given an opportunity to rid himself of the Intersect but will have to protect Ellie from Fulcrum on her wedding day.

1.title: Chuck Versus the Pink Slip
1.plot: Chuck's new abilities with the upgraded Intersect prove to be problematic in spy training and creates conflict with Sarah.

2.title: Chuck Versus the Three Words
2.plot: Things are turned upside-down when Carina pays a visit with her fiancé. A lie told by Morgan complicates matters.

3.title: Chuck Versus the Angel de la Muerte
3.plot: Chuck needs Awesome's help to protect a dictator who is targeted for assassination.

4.title: Chuck Versus Operation Awesome
4.plot: Chuck must show Captain Awesome how to be a spy when he is targeted by an evil agent. Morgan's promotion to Assistant Manager changes his relationship with Jeff and Lester.

5.title: Chuck Versus First Class
5.plot: Shaw sends Chuck on a solo mission to Paris, over Sarah and Casey's protests, where Chuck meets a beautiful woman and flashes on an assassin en route. Morgan gains an unexpected ally in dealing with Jeff and Lester at the Buy More.

6.title: Chuck Versus the Nacho Sampler
6.plot: Chuck trains a new Nerd Herder and deals with an asset with ties to The Ring. Devon gets nervous about covering for Chuck when Ellie gets suspicious of his work.

7.title: Chuck Versus the Mask
7.plot: Shaw sends Chuck and Hannah on a mission, forcing Sarah to work with him. Morgan and Ellie team up to find out information regarding Chuck.

8.title: Chuck Versus the Fake Name
8.plot: Chuck's plans to cook dinner for Hannah, Ellie, and Devon are interrupted when he has to pose as an assassin. Sarah vows to keep her relationship with Shaw professional.

9.title: Chuck Versus the Beard
9.plot: Chuck is taken off active duty when he has problems trying to use the Intersect and is put in imminent danger without Sarah's and Casey's help.

10.title: Chuck Versus the Tic Tac
10.plot: When a job Casey performs for his former commander lands him in jail for treason, Chuck and Sarah must come to the rescue. Devon has to scramble to keep Chuck's secret from Ellie when she wins a fellowship grant.

11.title: Chuck Versus the Final Exam
11.plot: Sarah and Shaw must grade Chuck on his last test before officially becoming a CIA operative.

12.title: Chuck Versus the American Hero
12.plot: When Chuck has to select a partner for an important undercover mission, Casey, Devon, and Morgan conspire to make sure he chooses Sarah.

13.title: Chuck Versus the Other Guy
13.plot: Morgan considers quitting the Buy More. Chuck, Sarah, and Shaw go after the Ring operative who killed Shaw's wife.

14.title: Chuck Versus the Honeymooners
14.plot: Chuck and Sarah encounter enemy spies while on a train trip through Europe and must rely on the CIA's newest team for help: Casey and Morgan.

15.title: Chuck Versus the Role Models
15.plot: Casey's patience is tried when he has to train Morgan to be an agent, while Chuck and Sarah learn from a successful but splintered married team of spies.

16.title: Chuck Versus the Tooth
16.plot: A series of disturbing dreams compels General Beckman to send Chuck to see a psychiatrist. Anna Wu comes back to the Buy More.

17.title: Chuck Versus the Living Dead
17.plot: Chuck's father returns when he finds out Chuck uploaded the new Intersect. Chuck enlists the help of Morgan on a new mission.

18.title: Chuck Versus the Subway
18.plot: Casey goes undercover to protect his daughter from The Ring, Big Mike receives some shocking news regarding the Buy More, and Chuck's father becomes the team's only chance of survival against The Ring.

19.title: Chuck Versus the Ring: Part II
19.plot: Casey goes undercover to protect his daughter from The Ring, Big Mike receives some shocking news regarding the Buy More, and Chuck's father becomes the team's only chance of survival against The Ring.

1.title: Chuck Versus the Anniversary
1.plot: No longer working for the government, Chuck enlists Morgan's help to search for his mother. Sarah and Casey must infiltrate a mysterious Russian company, and Ellie has important news to tell the family.

2.title: Chuck Versus the Suitcase
2.plot: As the team tracks down a high-tech weapon in Milan during Fashion Week, Chuck discovers some issues in his relationship with Sarah. Morgan uncovers a flaw in Buy More's security, and Casey tries to acclimate himself to living in Burbank.

3.title: Chuck Versus the Cubic Z
3.plot: Two former enemies set their sights on Chuck and Sarah when they escape from custody during a prisoner transfer. Morgan receives a surprise from Big Mike.

4.title: Chuck Versus the Coup d'Etat
4.plot: Chuck and Sarah work on their relationship as they accompany Ellie and Devon to Costa Gravas to meet Premier Alejandro Goya. Casey has to contend with Morgan's interest in his daughter.

5.title: Chuck Versus the Couch Lock
5.plot: Members of Casey's old combat unit attempt to find him. Chuck continues his search for his mother, and Morgan is hesitant to tell Casey a big secret.

6.title: Chuck Versus the Aisle of Terror
6.plot: Chuck, Sarah, Casey, and Morgan must stop a scientist from releasing a nightmare-inducing toxin. Damaging information regarding Chuck's mother is discovered. Devon's mother pays a visit. Jeff and Lester deck out the Buy More for Halloween.

7.title: Chuck Versus the First Fight
7.plot: After getting into a fight with Sarah, Chuck goes on a solo mission and locates his mother's spy handler and a Russian agent. Ellie investigates her family's history.

8.title: Chuck Versus the Fear of Death
8.plot: In order to repair his status as an agent and his relationship with Sarah, Chuck agrees to go on a dangerous mission with an eccentric partner. Morgan and Casey must stop Jeff and Lester from knowing the true identity of Greta at the store.

9.title: Chuck Versus Phase Three
9.plot: While hiding out in Southeast Asia from an international agent determined to locate the Intersect, Sarah goes on a rogue mission. Ellie and Awesome work to uncover a family secret.

10.title: Chuck Versus the Leftovers
10.plot: Things are turned upside-down the day after Thanksgiving when Chuck's mother drops by...along with as Alexei Volkoff. Morgan must deal with Jeff and Lester during the Black Friday sale at the Buy More.

11.title: Chuck Versus the Balcony
11.plot: Chuck and Sarah try to combine a romantic French getaway with a mission to find a specialized microchip. Lester asks Big Mike for romantic advice.

12.title: Chuck Versus the Gobbler
12.plot: Chuck becomes worried when Sarah goes to extreme measures to help his mother take down Alexei Volkoff. Ellie and Devon have trouble deciding the name of their new baby.

13.title: Chuck Versus the Push Mix
13.plot: Chuck and Morgan embark on a mission to take down Alexei Volkoff, while Sarah tries to rescue Chuck's mom. Casey tries to get to know his daughter better, and Ellie eases Devon into fatherhood.

14.title: Chuck Versus the Seduction Impossible
14.plot: Chuck, Sarah, and Casey must travel to Morocco to rescue suave former agent Roan Montgomery. Morgan meet's Alex's mother, and Mary Bartowski acclimates herself to civilian life and spends time with her new granddaughter.

15.title: Chuck Versus the Cat Squad
15.plot: Chuck gets more than he bargained for when he reunites Sarah with her former team. Morgan's ex-girlfriend is back in town.

16.title: Chuck Versus the Masquerade
16.plot: Chuck and Sarah's Valentine's Day is put on hold when they must travel to England to protect an oil baron's daughter. A mysterious woman makes Casey a compelling offer. Ellie and Devon receive parenting help from an unusual source.

17.title: Chuck Versus the First Bank of Evil
17.plot: Vivian joins the team on a mission. Morgan searches for a new roommate.

18.title: Chuck Versus the A-Team
18.plot: Chuck worries about his job as new agents are brought in. Chuck and Sarah suspect Casey is going on rogue missions. Morgan tries to make the best of things with his new roommate.

19.title: Chuck Versus the Muuurder
19.plot: Chuck's leadership skills are tested when someone is found murdered in Castle. Ellie picks up a hobby that worries Awesome, and Morgan is stuck in the middle when the Buy Morons take on the neighboring Large Mart.

20.title: Chuck Versus the Family Volkoff
20.plot: When the CIA targets Vivian Volkoff for assassination, Chuck turns to an unusual ally to protect her: Vivian's father, Alexei. Ellie suspects her mother doesn't want her to find out about her father's past.

21.title: Chuck Versus the Wedding Planner
21.plot: Chuck and Sarah call in her con-artist father, Jack Burton, to help recover the wedding funds they lost. Morgan talks Casey into meeting with Alex's mother.

22.title: Chuck Versus Agent X
22.plot: Devon's plans for Chuck's bachelor party go awry while unexpected visitors crash Sarah's bachelorette party. Ellie discovers an important secret about her father's research.

23.title: Chuck Versus the Last Details
23.plot: Ellie steps in to organize Chuck and Sarah's rehearsal dinner while they attempt to locate Chuck's mother and Morgan encounters Vivian Volkoff.

24.title: Chuck Versus the Cliffhanger
24.plot: When Chuck and Sarah enlist the help of Alexei Volkoff to stop his daughter from destroying their wedding, the CIA sends one of its best agents after them.

locations: Warner Brothers Burbank Studios - 4000 Warner Boulevard, Burbank, California, USA::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: Since geeky Chuck accidentally became the mental host of the Intersect, an unprecedentedly powerful computer mind containing all information available to the US government, he's a primordial national security asset and risk. So CIA and NSA each appoint a top agent to guard Chuck, and often get involved with him in spy adventures. Meanwhile his identity must be kept secret from Chuck's sister, her perfect partner Devon, both surgeons, and Chuck's goofy colleagues in Buy More, the Burbank electronics store where he works as a cover.
imdb.title: Chuck
plot: When a twenty-something computer geek inadvertently downloads critical government secrets into his brain, the C.I.A. and the N.S.A. assign two agents to protect him and exploit such knowledge, turning his life upside down.::TB4000 and Juan Cruz

Since geeky _Chuck_ (qv) accidentally became the mental host of the Intersect, an unprecedentedly powerful computer mind containing all information available to the US government, he's a primordial national security asset and risk. So CIA and NSA each appoint a top agent to guard _Chuck_ (qv), and often get involved with him in spy adventures. Meanwhile his identity must be kept secret from _Chuck_ (qv)'s sister, her perfect partner Devon, both surgeons, and _Chuck_ (qv)'s goofy colleagues in Buy More, the Burbank electronics store where he works as a cover.::KGF Vissers

When an ordinary underachieving guy named _Chuck_ (qv) Bartowski gets an email from his old college friend Bryce Larkin he opens it to see a series of pictures called the intersect which has all of the governments most vital secrets. Now that _Chuck_ (qv) is the most important government assets in the world the CIA and NSA get their top agents, Sarah walker(CIA) and John Casey(NSA). Full of action packed fighting (not so much of _Chuck_ (qv) fighting) and a whole lot of _Chuck_ (qv) finding a way to save the day, using the intersect of course but somtimes the help of friends. And that's _Chuck_ (qv) for you.::patrick-59000

When _Chuck_ (qv) Bartowski gets kicked out of Stanford and stuck in a dead end job as a computer nerd for the Buy More he is accidentally sees an email full of government secrets sent to him by an old college buddy forcing _Chuck_ (qv) into a world of spies, danger, and frenzy.::ahmetkozan
